local_intent: Align wrist yaw to 90° for the bar handle after moving to the handle, and verify orientation.
assumptions: Treat target as a bar-type drawer handle; 90° yaw is the correct alignment for grasping.
coherence_with_global: Implements the perception->move->SetTCPYaw(90)->verify(AtOrientation) slice consistent with the global drawer-opening sequence, including the same scan-with-retry semantics.
